message.body: I called Cindy again today & left another message. I then spoke to Beth for awhile. She said she was going to call you. Did you hear from her?
No but I'm confused about how talking to them would help
(That sounds snarky but I don't mean it so)
She has been spraying and dusting for ...months?
It's a little hard to explain in a text but Beth is a bed bug expert. Cindy isn't. Beth would be treating this but she blew out her knee.
If she talks to you & asks questions she might be able to figure out why Cindy's treatments have been ineffective.
Ok. Sounds good.
She can call me any time
She said its one of two things.
One is the bedbugs have gained a resistance to the chemicals they use.
Yikes
Yes Alec found two right on my floor
Happily walking right over the dust and the spray haha
Looking rather fat and self satisfied
OK. The other is kind of a long shot but it is an outside chance that you guys keep visiting another place that has bed bugs & bringing them back with you. But I'm pretty certain that's not the case.
I think this is either a chemical thing or what I think they are hiding in a place that she isn't getting to.
Yeah. That's what I think.
Maybe but I think it's them getting past or around the dust / spray. She did say she switched chemicals.
Have you heard from Beth yet? I want to figure out why we are having such a tough time in your room. Others have gotten bed bugs but no one seems to have gotten it nearly as bad as you have.
Yes
Cool. Did she seem to have any theories, insights etc?
Haha no
I just talked to Beth for a while. Where did Alec see the bedbugs? Closer to 49th St side? Closer to the hallway?
Center of my room right on my floor
Two of them just walking calmly across my floor as if they were off to tea
Could you tell which direction they were headed? Ballsy Little Fuckers!!
Haha no
